basePins.label: Office Key
basePins.notes: Located in the main office building. Check desk drawers and filing cabinets.

basePins.label: Storage Room Key
basePins.notes: Found near the storage area. Often spawns on shelves or in boxes.

basePins.label: Player Spawn A
basePins.notes: Main spawn point for players. High traffic area.

basePins.label: Emergency Exit
basePins.notes: Safe extraction point. Requires no key. Always available.
